snippet: Mitt Romney notes that Rick Santorum endorsed him in 2008.
abstract: Mitt Romney notes that Rick Santorum endorsed him in 2008.
lead_paragraph: ATLANTIC, Iowa - Mitt Romney offered his most extensive comments on his presidential rival Rick Santorum - a former senator from Pennsylvania who is experiencing a surge in the polls - when pressed by reporters during a question-and-answer session following an event here.

headline.main: Romney Talks About  Santorum, a Bit Mischievously
